description: Structure for generating professional freelancing proposals

greeting.example: Hello, I'm interested in your [Job Title] project.

understanding.description: Brief statement showing understanding of the project requirements
understanding.example: I understand you need [brief description of main requirement].

approach.description: 1-2 sentences describing your approach to completing the task
approach.example: I will use [tools/methods] to [achieve goal] efficiently and accurately.

deliverables.description: List of specific deliverables that will be provided

timeline.description: Estimated completion time or 'To be discussed'
timeline.example: I can complete this within [timeframe] or 'To be discussed'

pricing.description: Pricing proposal based on budget/payment terms from job posting
pricing.example: My rate is [amount] [currency] [hourly/fixed] as per your budget.

next_steps.description: What happens next (e.g., 'Ready to start immediately', 'Available for discussion')
next_steps.example: Ready to start immediately upon acceptance.

guidelines: Match pricing to client's budget/payment terms when possible
Be confident but not overly promotional
